---
title: "Module 17 - Multi-omic analysis of HMP2 data"
output: html_document
date: "2025-08-28"
---

In this script, we will analyze the MetaCyc pathway data from the IBDMDB (HMP2) dataset. We will use the publicly available metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data files.

This module is based on the tutorial from the MTXmodel package: <https://biobakery.github.io/MTXmodel/articles/MTX_model_tutorial.html>.

The MTX model package is designed to co-analyze metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data.

**Carolyn Forward** is credited with preprocessing the IBDMDB datasets used in this R markdown script and adapting the MTXmodel tutorial for this module. Thanks, Carolyn!

```{r Load libraries and data files}
library(devtools)
install_github('biobakery/MTX_model')

library(tidyverse)
library(MTXmodel)

mgx = read.delim("../Datasets/HMP2_pwyDNA.tsv", row.names = 1)
mtx = read.delim("../Datasets/HMP2_pwyRNA.tsv", row.names = 1)

# Examine data
str(mgx)
View(mgx)
```
